mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basis_tb_user_job ( USER_ID, JOB_ID, STATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{jobId}, 'U', NOW(), #{modifyUser}, NOW(), #{modifyUser} )
